text: Dustin Poirier Nickname "The Diamond" (born January 19, 1989 in Lafayette, Louisiana ) is an American professional mixed martial artist who currently competes in the Featherweight and Lightweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He is a former Interim UFC Lightweight Champion (One time). In the lightweight division, he holds notable wins over former UFC champions Anthony Pettis, Eddie Alvarez, and Conor McGregor. == References == == Other websites == * Dustin Poirier Profile at UFC.com * * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:american mixed martial artists
title: Dustin Poirier
